nml_option.name: config_AM_meridionalHeatTransport_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member meridional_heat_transport is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_meridionalHeatTransport_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_meridionalHeatTransport_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_meridionalHeatTransport_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member output occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_meridionalHeatTransport_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the meridional heat transport analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_meridionalHeatTransport_num_bins
nml_option.description: Number of bins used for meridional heat transport.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive integer value less than or equal to nMerHeatTransBins.

nml_option.name: config_AM_meridionalHeatTransport_min_bin
nml_option.description: minimum bin boundary value. If set to -1.0e34, the minimum value in the domain is found.

nml_option.name: config_AM_meridionalHeatTransport_max_bin
nml_option.description: maximum bin boundary value. If set to -1.0e34, the maximum value in the domain is found.

nml_option.name: config_AM_meridionalHeatTransport_region_group
nml_option.description: The name of the region group, for which the MHT should be computed in addition to the global MHT.
nml_option.possible_values: 'all', '', or the name of a region group.

dim.name: nMerHeatTransBins
dim.description: Maximum number of bins for meridional heat transport.

dim.name: nMerHeatTransBinsP1
dim.description: Maximum number of bins for meridional heat transport, plus one.

package.name: meridionalHeatTransportAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the meridional heat transport analysis member.

var.name: binBoundaryMerHeatTrans
var.description: Coordinate of southern edge of meridional heat transport bin, either in latitude or y, for plotting.

var.name: meridionalHeatTransportLatZ
var.description: Northward heat transport at locations defined at the binBoundaryMerHeatTrans coordinates by vertical level.

var.name: merHeatTransLatZRegion
var.description: Northward heat transport by vertical level and region.

var.name: meridionalHeatTransportLat
var.description: Northward heat transport at locations defined at the binBoundaryMerHeatTrans coordinates.

var.name: merHeatTransLatRegion
var.description: Northward heat transport at locations defined at the binBoundaryMerHeatTrans coordinates, by region.

var.name: minMaxLatRegionMHT
var.description: Coordinates of the southern and northern edge of each region (for drawing).
